Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc03
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc03.view.tui

Class SideView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc03.view.tui.SideView
public class SideView extends Object
Class responsible for generating a visual representation of a side of a card.

    • generateAndPutBox

      private void generateAndPutBox(CharColor color, int x, int y, int width, int height, char topLeft, char topRight, char bottomLeft, char bottomRight)
      Generates and puts a box on the side view.
      Parameters:
      color - The color of the box.
      x - The x-coordinate of the top-left corner of the box.
      y - The y-coordinate of the top-left corner of the box.
      width - The width of the box.
      height - The height of the box.
      topLeft - The character for the top-left corner of the box.
      topRight - The character for the top-right corner of the box.
      bottomLeft - The character for the bottom-left corner of the box.
      bottomRight - The character for the bottom-right corner of the box.
